results.title: The Shot
results.creator_credit: Puven Pather, Tim Kreibig and AFTRS
results.brief_description: After a prolonged career as a war correspondent photographer, Mick thinks he can see through the horror of the environment he works in, until he falls victim to his own convictions! A look into the moral and ethical dilemmas of a war correspondent. Cast features Tony Martin as Mick and mark Lee as Terry.
results.description: After a prolonged career as a war correspondent photographer, Mick thinks he can see through the horror of the environment he works in, until he falls victim to his own convictions! results.title: The Letter
results.creator_credit: Anne Delaney, Carolyn Johnson and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A visually beautiful film about the pain, fear and courage of the 19th century novelist Fanny Burney, who had her right breast removed without anaesthetic in 1811. It is based on a letter Fanny wrote to her sister some months later. Cast includes Skye Wansey as Fanny Burney and Rachel Blake as the voice of Fanny Burney.
The original letter now resides in the New York Public Library.

results.title: Castor and Pollux: a tale of two spiritual brothers
results.creator_credit: Phil Noyce, Tom Manefield and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A sometimes humorous, sometimes serious examination of the lifestyles of two middle-aged men in a revolt against conventional living. One is a bikie and the other a hippy.

results.title: The Laundry
results.creator_credit: Alex Chomicz, Lesley Dyer and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A big man covered in blood enters a basement laundry. Is the threat in her mind or it real? And which is more scary…?
Cast features Rhonnda Findleton and Domenic Galati.

results.title: Audacious
results.creator_credit: Samantha Lang, Fiona Tuomy and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Stella, a young woman bored with her husband’s bedroom behaviour, embarks on a daring journey to the other side of sexual satisfaction.
Cast features Dee Smart as Stella and John Polson as Tom.

results.title: Redfern Beach
results.creator_credit: Catriona McKenzie, Rachel Roberts and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Max needs to choose between money and love. An old bagman gives Max a magic fishing lure. As colour begins to seep into his life, the choice becomes clear.
Cast features Michael Tuahine, Phaedra Nicolaidis, Nicholas Papademetriou and Tony Barry.

results.title: Inja = Dog
results.creator_credit: Steve Pasvolsky, Joe Weatherstone and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
South Africa, 1980s. Using a young Xhosa boy as a pawn, a farmer teaches his puppy to be white man’s best friend. Ten years later, both their lives hang in the balance at the mercy of the dog.
Filmed on location at Bien Donne Werf, Franschhoek Valley, South Africa.
In English/Afrikaans/Xhosa with English subtitles

results.title: Basilisk stare
results.creator_credit: Mis Kamieniak, Chryss Carr and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A psychosexual drama which launches the viewer into the inner-space of the male psyche in order to depict the way the modern male constructs sex. The film excites and disturbs the viewer with the use of a split screen, which allows for the pitching of two images against each other in order to create a sense of both excitement and voyeuristic curiosity.
Cast includes David Wenham, Amy Pedersen and Jared Turner

results.title: Together in the middle of nowhere
results.creator_credit: Tony Krawitz, Rachel Clements and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Vince embarks on an odyssey through the city streets while his girlfriend Jacqui works in a stripclub until dawn. Over one night they journey into the darkness of their own hearts to find out what really matters. Cast includes Mark Priestley as Vince and Hayley McElhinney as Jacqui

results.title: Vasili's garden
results.brief_description: Welcome to Vasili’s Garden, a fun and very organic gardening show with lots of entertainment. Vasili enters people’s lives via the garden gate and together with the garden’s creator he delves into the private world beyond the backyard fence exploring their gardening obsessions and fantasies, sharing their tips and common sense. A tour around everyday gardens presented in both Greek and English with helpful tips and advice.
